src: “Gosi nu tene ratus di 4 mês ki ka é diabétiku ma ki éra diabétiku”, el krisenta.
mt: “Show me someone who has had diabetes for 4 months and who is not diabetic,” he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor di medisina na Universidadi di Dalhousie na Halifax, Novu Skósia y prizidenti di divizon klíniku y sientífiku di Asosiason Kanadianu di Diabetis aviza ma investigason inda sta na se primérus dia.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and president of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, says the study is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Sima alguns otus spesialistas, el sta diskunfiadu si diabeti pode ser kuradu, ta nota ma es diskubertas ka ten relevansia pa pesoas ki dja tene diabeti Tipu1.
mt: Some experts have questioned whether diabetes can be cured, noting that the discovery has relevance for people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Na sigunda-fera, Sara Danius, sekretária permaneti di Kumité Nobel di Literatura na Akademia Suéku, anúnsia publikamenti duranti un prugrama di rádiu na Rádiu Sveriges na Suésia ma kumité, komu ka konsigi txiga diretamenti na Bob Dylan pamodi el ganha Prémiu Nobel di Literatura di 2016, el dizisti di se sforsus pa txiga tn-el.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced publicly during a radio program on Swedish Radio in Sweden that the committee had decided to award Bob Dylan the Nobel Prize in Literature for 2016, she said she was forced to do so.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius fla: “Nes mumentu li, nu ka sa ta faze nada. Dja-N txoma y manda email pa se kulaborador más prósimu y dja-N resebe monti rispostas dretu. Pa gosi, kel-la é di serteza sufisienti.”
mt: Dan says: “At that moment, I didn’t know what to do. I called and emailed my closest collaborators and I received immediate responses. To give you an idea, she was sure enough.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Antisi, PCA di Ring, Jamie Siminoff, observa ma enpreza kumesa kantu ka ta daba pa obiba se kanpainha di porta di se loja pa garaji.
mt: Anti, the CEO of Ring, Jamie Siminoff, observes as the company's campaign to put a doorbell on every garage nears completion.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: El konstrui un kanpainha sen fius, el fla.
mt: He built a campaign site, he says.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff fla ma vendas aumenta dipôs ki el parse na 2013 nun epizódiu di Shark Tank undi ki painel di prugrama rikuza finansiamentu di aranki.
mt: 2013 Shark Tank episode panelists declined to invest in the product.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Na final di 2017, Siminoff parse na kanal di tilivizon di konpras QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC television shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring tanbê rizolve un prusesu judisial ku un enpreza di siguransa konkorenti, ADT Corporation.
mt: The company is also involved in a legal process with a competing security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Enquantu ki un vasina spirimental surgi kapaz di reduzi mortalidadi di Ébola, ti gosi, ninhun medikamentu ka foi klaramenti dimostradu adekuadu pa trata infeson izistenti.
mt: While a new experimental vaccine has shown the ability to reduce mortality from Ebola, no medication has yet been clearly demonstrated adequate to treat existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Un cocktail di antikorpus, ZMapp, inisialmenti mostra un promesa na terenu, mas studu formal ta indika ma el tinha ménus binifísius di ki privenson di morti.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially showed promise in trials, but formal studies indicate it had little benefit over standard treatment.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Na insaiu PALM, ZMapp sirvi di kontrolu, ô seja, sientistas utiliza-l komu bazi di riferénsia y es konpara kes otu três tratamentus ku el.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a reference and compared it to three other treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Jinástika di Merka ta apoia karta di Kumité Olínpiku Merkanu y ta aseita nisisidadi obsulutu di família olínpiku di promove un anbienti siguru pa tudu nos atletas.
mt: The United States Olympic Committee supports the IOC's zero-tolerance policy for family members of Olympic athletes to promote a safe environment for all our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Nu ta konkorda ku diklarason di USOC di ki interese di nos atletas y klubis, y di ses disportu, pode ser midjor sirbidu si nu avansa ku mudansa signifikativu dentu di nos organizason, enves di disertifikason.
mt: We do not agree with the USOC's statement of what is in the best interest of our athletes and clubs, and of the five sports, can be significantly improved if we do not advance with significant changes within our organization, instead of disqualification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Jinástika di Merka ta apoia un invistigason indipendenti ki pode sklarese modi ki abuzu di kel proporson diskritu ton korajozamenti pa sobriviventis di Larry Nassar pudia pasaba sen ser persebedu pa tantu ténpu y ta abrasa kualker mudansa nisisáriu y apropriadu.
mt: USA Gymnastics is supporting an independent investigation that could clarify how abuse allegations against Larry Nassar were ignored for so long and what changes need to be made and implemented.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Jinástika di Merka y USOC ten mésmu objetivu - torna disportu di jinástika, y otus, ton siguru kuantu pusível pa atletas sigi ses sonhus nun anbienti siguru, puzitivu y ku enpuderamentu.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal - to return gymnastics, and other sports, to a safe, positive and empowering environment for athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Duranti dékada di 1960, Brzezinski trabadja pa John F. Kennedy komu se konselheru y dipôs pa adiministrason di Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as a counselor and aide to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Duranti seleson di 1976 el konsedja Carter sobri pulítika sternu, y dipôs sirvi komu Konselheru di Siguransa Nasional (NSA) di 1977 a 1981, ta susede Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 he conceded Carter on stern politics, and served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Komu NSA, el djuda Carter trata asuntus mundial ku diplomasia, sima Akordus di Camp David, 1978; normalizason di rilason Merka-Xina na final di anus 70; Rivoluson Iranianu, ki leba pa krizi di riféns Iranianu, 1979; y invazon Suviétiku na Afeganiston, 1979.
mt: 1977-1981: As National Security Advisor, he advised Carter on world affairs, including the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of U.S.-China relations at the end of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iranian hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Kel filmi, ku Ryan Gosling y Emma Stone, resebe nomiasons na tudu kategoria prinsipal.
mt: 2017's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling y Stone resebe nomiason pa Midjor Ator y Atris, rispetivamnti.
mt: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress, respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Kes otus nomiason ta inklui Midjor Filmi, Diretor, Sinematografia, Figurinu, Edison di Filmi, Partitura Orijinal, Design di Produson, Edison di Son, Mistura di Son y Roteru Orijinal.
mt: The other categories are Major Film, Director, Cinematography, Actor, Original Score, Original Screenplay, Production Design, Original Song, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dôs muzika di filmi, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) y City of Stars, resebe nomiason pa midjor muzika orijinal. Stúdiu di Lionsgate resebe 26 nomiason - más di ki kualker stúdiu.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations - more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Na final di dumingu, Prizidenti di Merka Donald Trump, na un kumunikadu imitidu através di sekretáriu di inprensa, anúnsia ma tropas Merkanu ta sa ta sai di Síria.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement released through his press secretary, announced that U.S. troops will be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Anúnsiu foi fetu dipôs ki Trump tevi un konversa na tilifóni ku Prizidenti Turku Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump had a phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turquia ta asumiba tanbê guarda kes konbatentis di ISIS kapturadu ki, sigundu diklarason, nasons Europeu nega ripatria.
mt: Turkey is taking in both captured ISIS fighters and, according to a second declaration, European nations refuse repatriation.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Kel-li ka ta apénas konfirma ma peloménus alguns dinosaurus tinha penas, un tioria ki dja spadjadu, mas tanbê ta fornese ditalhis ki fósel jeralmenti ka pode, sima kor y dispuzison tridimensional.
mt: Researchers have confirmed that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has been widely accepted, but also provide details that the general public may not know, such as color and three-dimensional structure.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Sientistas ta fla ma plumajen des animal éra kastanhadu di riba ku un parti dibaxu pálidu ô di kor karotenoidi.
mt: Scientists say the feathers of a brown bird on top with a pale part below are due to carotenoid pigments.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Diskubertas tanbê ta proporsiona un vison sobri evuluson di penas na avis.
mt: The discovery also suggests a sobering vision of evolution in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Pamodi penas di dinosauru ka ten un eixu mutu dizenvolvidu, ki txoma rákis, mas ten otus karaterístikas di penas — farpas y bárbula — piskizadoris deduzi ma kel rákis foi provavelmenti un dizenvolvimentu ivolusionáriu pusterior a es otus karaterístikas.
mt: Because the tail of a dinosaur is a modified version of the hind legs, scientists deduce that the tail evolved after the hind legs.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Strutura di penas ta sujere ma es ka foi utilizadu na vôu, mas sin na rigulason ô spuzison di tenperatura. Invistigadoris sujere ma, enbora kel-li é rabu di un dinosauru joven, amostra ta mostra plumajen adultu y nau di un pinton.
mt: The structure of the pen suggests that it was used for flight, but without any regulation or specification of temperature. Investigators suggest, although the remains of a young dinosaur, the samples show adult feathers and a tail of a pin.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Invistigadoris sujere ma, enbora kel-li é rabu di un dinosauru joven, amostra ta mostra plumajen adultu y nau di un pinton.
mt: Researchers suggest, although the remains are of a young dinosaur, the samples show adult feathers and a beak.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Un karu armadilhadu detonadu na sedi di pulísia na Gaziantep, Turkia, onti di sedu mata dôs ajénti y firi más di vinti otus algen.
mt: A car bomb exploded outside a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two officers and injuring more than 20 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Gabineti di guvernador fla ma dizanovi di kes firidu éra pulísia.
mt: The governor's office says the police are investigating the incident.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Pulísia fla ma es ta suspeita ki un alegadu militanti di Daesh (ISIL) é risponsável pa ataki.
mt: Police say a suspected Daesh (ISIL) militant is responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Es diskubri ma Sol ta funsionaba ku bazi na mésmus prinsípiu báziku ki otus strelas: Verifikadu ma atividadi di tudu strelas éra inpulsionadu pa se luminozidadi, se rotason, y nada más.
mt: It was discovered that the Sun works on the same basic principle as other stars: Verified that all stars are driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Luminozidadi y rotatividadi ta uzadu tudu djuntu pa ditirmina númeru Rossby di un strela, ki sta rilasionadu ku fluksu di plasma.
mt: Brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to plasma flux.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Kuantu más poku for númeru di Rossby, ménus ativu é strela en rilason a inversons magnétiku.
mt: The more positive the Rossby number, the more active and starry the relationship to magnetic inversions.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Duranti se viajen, Iwasaki kai na prublémas na monti okazion.
mt: During the trip, Iwasaki had problems in the mountains.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: El foi asaltadu pa piratas, atakadu na Tibete pa un katxor raivozu, el fungi di kazamentu na Nepal y el foi prézu na Índia.
mt: 1. He was attacked by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a furious cat, he served in Nepal and he was kidnapped in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Norma di 802.11n ta funsiona na frikuénsia di 2.4Ghz y na 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n standards work at both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Kel-li ta permiti pa ser au kontráriu konpatível ku 802.11a, 802.11b y 802.11g, kontantu ki stason bazi ten rádius duplu.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g compatible, but with twice the range of a base station.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Velosidadis di 802.11n é substansialmenti más rápidu di ki di se predesesoris ku un débitu téoriku másimu di 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are substantially faster than its predecessors with a theoretical maximum of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ki é kazadu y ten dôs fidju grandi, ka dexa un grandi inpreson na Miller, ki stória foi kontadu.
mt: 2-year-old Duvall, who has two older siblings, left a lasting impression on Miller, whose story was told.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Kantu el pididu pa el kumenta, Miller fla: “Mike ta fala txeu duranti audiénsia...N staba ta pripara pa-N ka obi rialmenti kuze ki el staba ta fla.”
mt: When asked to comment, Miller said: "Mike is talking through his ass during the hearing...I was preparing to actually punch him in the face for what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Nu ta tenta riduzi imison di dióksidu di karbonu pa unidadi di PIB pa un marjen notável ti 2020 en relason a nível di 2005”, Hu fla.
mt: “ We are not trying to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 compared to 2005,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: El ka difini un valor pa kes kortis, el fla ma ta ser fetu ku bazi na produson ekonómiku di Xina.
mt: He set a value for the yuan, he says it will be based on China's economic production.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu enkoraja país en dizenvolvimentu “pa ivita kel bedju kaminhu di polui priméru y linpa dipôs.”
mt: The report urges developing countries “to avoid the mistakes of the developed world and leapfrog to cleaner, greener technologies.”
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: El akrisenta ma “es ka debe pidi, nu entantu, pes asumi un obrigason ki ta bai paralén di fazi di dizenvolvimentu, risponsabilidadi y kapasidadi.”
mt: He said, "It is not a request, but rather an obligation that will go beyond the phase of development, responsibility and capacity."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Grupu di Studu sobri Iraki aprizenta oji se rilatóriu 12:00 GMT.
mt: 12:00 GMT, a group of Iraqi studies will present their report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ta aviza Ningén ka ta pode garanti ma kualker ason na Iraki nes mumentu ta para géra sektáriu, violénsia krisenti, ô un dislizamentu en direson a kaus.
mt: No one can guarantee what will happen in Iraq at the moment, whether it will be sectarian violence, a resurgence of the insurgency, or a descent into chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Rilatóriu ta inisia ku un apélu a un dibati abertu y a formason di un konsensu na Merka sobri pulítika pa Médiu Orienti.
mt: The report begins with a call for an open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States on Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Kel Rilatóriu é seriamenti krítiku na kuazi tudu aspetu di pulítika atual di Izekutivu en rilason a Iraki y ta apela a un mudansa imediatu di direson.
mt: The report is seriously critical of almost every aspect of the current executive's policy in Iraq and calls for an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Priméru di se 78 rikumendason é pa un novu inisiativa diplomátiku tomadu antis di fin des anu pa proteje fronteras di Iraki kontra intervensons ostil y pa ristabelese rilason diplomátiku ku se vizinhus.
mt: 78 recommendations are made for a new diplomatic initiative taken before the end of the year to protect Iraq's borders against hostile interventions and to reestablish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Atual senador y Priméru-Dama di Arjentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner anúnsia se kandidatura prizidensial onti di noti na La Plata, un sidadi 50 kilómitru (31 milhas) di Buenos Aires.
mt: Current Argentine senator and First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy on Saturday night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Sra. Kirchner anúnsia se intenson di konkore pa prizidensia na Tiatru Arjentinu, mésmu lugar ki el uzaba pa inisia kanpanha na 2005 pa Senadu komu ménbru di delegason di provínsia di Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same place she used to start her campaign in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires provincial delegation to the Senate.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Dibati foi dizinkadiadu pa kontrovérsia sobri gastus na ajuda y rikonstruson di stera di Furakon Katrina; ki alguns konservadoris fiskal txoma di forma xuxanti di “Akordu di Bush di Novu Orleans.”
mt: The bill was criticized for its cost in hurricane relief and reconstruction; some fiscal conservatives called it the "Bush-Blanco New Orleans Accord."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Krítikas liberal di isforsu di rikonstruson ten konsentradu na adijidikason di kontratus di rikonstruson pa pesoas privilijiadu identifikadu di Washington.
mt: Liberal critics of the stimulus package focused on the contracts for privileged individuals identified in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Más di kuatu milhon di pesoas bai pa Roma pa sisti funeral.
mt: 2 million people are expected to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Númeru di algen ki staba prizenti éra ton txeu ki ka éra pusível pa tudu algen ten asesu a funeral na Prasa di Son Pedru.
mt: 10 tons of algae were present and it was possible for all algae to attend the funeral in the port of San Pedro.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Monti ekran jiganti instaladu na txeu lugar na Roma pa pesoas pode odja serimónia.
mt: 3D screens installed in a church in Rome allow people to watch a ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Na txeu otus sidadi di Itália y na réstu di mundu, partikularmenti na Polónia, foi fetu konfigurasons similhanti, ki foi vistu pa un grandi númeru di pesoas.
mt: In other cities in Italy and around the world, particularly in Poland, similar configurations were seen, which were seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Storiadoris kritika pulítikas antirioris di FBI na konsentra rikursus na kazus ki é fásil di rizolve, spesialmenti kazus di karus robadu, ku intenson di omenta taxa di susésu di ajénsia.
mt: Journalists criticize former FBI officials for focusing resources on cases that are easy to resolve, especially cases of stolen cars, with the intention of increasing the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongrésu kumesa ta finansia inisiativa di obsenidadi na anu fiskal di 2005 y spesifika ma FBI debe didika 10 ajentis pa pornografia adultu.
mt: 2005 fiscal year initiative to observe adult pornography, specifically the FBI must designate 10 agents to do so.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa faze maior pontuason di turnu, 70 koridas na apénas 41 bola y el serta 11 kuatu y 2 sais.
mt: 70 runs in 41 balls, 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Batedoris di orden médiu, Sachin Tendulkar y Rahul Dravid, faze un bon aprizentason y es faze un parseria di sen.
mt: 2nd Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st Test, 1st day, 1st
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Mas, dipôs di perde postigu di kapiton, Índia faze só 36 koridas perde 7 postu pa tirmina turnu.
mt: 36 more, after losing captaincy, India make just 36 runs in 7 overs to end innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Prizidenti di Merka George W. Bush txiga Singapura dia 16 di Nuvenbru di sedu, ta inísia un viajen di un simana pa Ázia.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W. Bush visits Singapore, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: El foi resebidu pa Priméru-Ministru di Singapura, Wong Kan Seng, y es diskuti kestons kumersial y di terorismu ku Priméru-Ministru, Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was received by Singaporean Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed commercial and terrorism issues with Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Dipôs di un simana di perda di ileison interkalar, Bush fala nun audiénsia sobri spanson di kumérsiu na Ázia.
mt: 1 week after a series of setbacks, Bush speaks to sober audience about expansion of commerce in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Priméru-Ministru Stephen Harper konkorda na manda “Lei di Ar Linpu” di guvernu pa un kumité di multi-partidáriu pa rivizon, antis di se sigundu leitura, dipôs di runion di 25 minotu di tersa-fera ku líder di PDN Jack Layton na EPM.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send "Liberal Leader" Bill C-311 to a multi-party committee for review, before its second reading, following a 25-minute meeting on Monday with NDP Leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton tinha pididu alterason na prujetu di lei anbiental di konservadoris duranti reunion ku PM, ta pedi un “riskrita konpletu” di prujetu di lei anbiental di Partidu Konservador.
mt: Layton had asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environmental policy during a meeting with the PM, and is asking for a "complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental policy.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Desdi ki Guvernu Federal interviri pa asumi finansiamentu di ôspital Mersey na Devonport, Tasmânia, guvernu stadual y alguns diputadus federal dja kritika es akordu komu un truki komu un prelúdiu di eleison federal a ser konvokadu ti Nuvenbru.
mt: Since the Federal Government took over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, state government and some federal MPs have criticised the deal as a prelude to a federal election to be called in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Mas Priméru-Ministru John Howard dja fla ma kel atu éra só pa salvaguarda instalason di ôspital di ser disklasifikadu pa guvernu di Tasmánia, na dá más di AUD$45 milhon.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said he would be "very disappointed" if the Tasmanian government failed to protect the hospital's facilities, which are worth more than AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Di akordu ku buletin risenti, leituras di nível di mar indika ma un tsunami foi jeradu. Tevi un sertu atividadi di tsunami rejistadu na prosimidadi di Pago Pago y Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has passed. There was a small tsunami registered near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ninhun danu ô firimentu gravi rilatadu na Tonga, mas lus bai tenpurariamenti, u ki supostamenti inpidi otoridadis di Tonga di resebe avizu di tsunami emitidu pa PTWC.
mt: A tsunami warning was issued for Tonga, but later cancelled, after a large earthquake was reported near Tonga, but later downgraded.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Katorzi skolas na Hawaii lokalizadu na kosta ô pertu di kosta foi inseradu tudu kuarta-feras apezar di avizus ten sidu kanseladu.
mt: 12 schools in Hawaii located on the oceanfront were closed on Friday despite warnings that they were unsafe.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Prizidenti di Merka George W. Bush kongratula kel anúnsiu.
mt: President of the United States George W. Bush congratulated the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Porta-vos di Bush, Gordon Johndroe, txoma promesa di Koreia di Norti “un pasu inpurtanti pa objetivu di alkansa disnukliarizason verifikável di península Koreanu.”
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said North Korea's move was "an important step toward verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Kel désimu tenpestadi di épuka di Furakon di Atlántiku, Tenpestadi Subtropikal Jerry, forma oji na Osianu Atlántiku.
mt: 10th tropical depression of the Atlantic hurricane season, Tropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Sentru Nasional di Furakon (NHC) fla ma, nes altura, Jerry ka ta koloka ninhun amiasa pa téra.
mt: The National Hurricane Center says, at 11:00 am EDT, Jerry was located about 1,000 miles east of the Lesser Antilles.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Korpu di Enjinherus di Merka stima ma 6 sentímitru di prisipitason pode ronpe dikis antiriormenti danifikadu.
mt: 6 inches of precipitation may break records before the storm ends.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Kel nonu Ala, ki tevi inundason ki txiga 20 pés (6.096m) di altura duranti furakon Katrina, sta gosi ku agu na altura di sintura, pamodi kel diki pertu d-el transborda.
mt: 9th Avenue, which was flooded and had 20 feet (6.096m) of water during Hurricane Katrina, is showing that the water is at the curb, as the street drains are clogged.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Agu sa ta lansa riba di diki nun sekson di 100 pés di largura.
mt: 100 feet wide sections are being launched.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Adiministrador di Kumuns Adam Cuerden spresa se frustason ku iliminasons kantu el fala ku Wikinews na mês pasadu.
mt: Adam Cuerden, a Wikimedia Foundation administrator, expressed his frustration with the lack of coverage when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “El [Wales] bazikamenti konta-nu mintira desdi inísiu. Priméru, ajindu sima ki éra pa razons jurídiku. En sigundu lugar, finjindu ma el staba ta obi-nu, ti ki se arti paga.”
mt: “[Wales] has been lying to us since the beginning. First, he was doing it for legal reasons. Secondly, he was lying about what he was doing, what he was paid for.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Iritason di kumunidadi leba a isforsus gosi pa ilabora un pulítika sobri kontiúdu seksual pa site ki ta aloja milhons di meus di kumunikason susial ku lisensa abertu.
mt: 1.5 million social media users with open licenses are to be given a sobering policy on sexual content.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Trabadju fetu foi maioritariamenti teóriku, mas prugrama foi skritu pa simula observason fetu di galásia di Sajitáriu.
mt: The theory was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Kel ifeitu ki ekipa staba ta buskaba ta serba kauzadu pa forsas di maré entri matéria skuru di galáksia y matéria di Via Láktia.
mt: The team that found it was caused by forces of the ocean entering the dark matter of the galaxy and the matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Sima lua ta izerse un puxon sobri téra, ki ta provoka maré, tanbê Via Láktia ta izerse un forsa sobri galáksia Sajitáriu.
mt: The Milky Way is being pulled by a supermassive black hole, which is causing the galaxy to wobble.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Sientistas konsigi konklui ma matéria prétu ta afeta otu matéria prétu di mésmu forma ki matéria normal ta.
mt: Scientists conclude that inert matter affects other inert matter in the same way that normal matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Es tioria ta fla ma maioria di matéria skuru a volta di un galáksia sta lokalizadu na volta di un spési di auréola, y é fetu di monti partíkulas pikinoti.
mt: The theory is that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is located near a ring, and is made up of tiny particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Riportajen di tilivizon mostra fumu branku ta sai di fábrika.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Otoridadis lokal sa ta aviza moradoris na prosimidadi di fábrika pa fika dentu kaza, pa disliga aparelhus di ar kondisionadu y pa ka bebe agu tornéra.
mt: Local authorities are advising residents near the factory to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Di akordu ku ajénsia nukliar di Japôn, sésiu radiuativu y iodu identifikadu na sentral.
mt: In agreement with Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were identified in the central area.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Outoridadis ta spekula ma kel-li ta indika ma kontentoris ku konbustível di urániu na lokal pode ter ratxadu y sa ta baza.
mt: Authorities speculate that the contents of the uranium fuel rods may have leaked and are the cause.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll deskubri kel Tuberkulozi stremamenti Rizistenti a Medikamentus (XDR-TB) na rijion Sul Afrikanu di KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the first case of extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Nun entrivista, el fla ma un novu varianti éra “txeu priokupanti y alarmanti pamodi kel taxa altu di mortalidadi.”
mt: In an interview, he said the new variant is “highly concerning and alarming because of the high mortality rate.”
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Alguns pasientis pode ter panhadu vírus na ôspital, Dr. Moll ta atxa, y peloménus dôs éra prufisional di saúdi di ôspital.
mt: Some patients may have contracted the virus at the hospital, Dr. Moll said, and two hospital staff members have been quarantined.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
